welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Flossmoor, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful time exploring!"

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all air cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and Delta Connection.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines and American Eagle.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
